\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{external}
\tikzexternalize[prefix=TikzPictures/, up to date check=diff, force remake]

\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{lmodern}

\usepackage{blochsphere}
\begin{document}

  \begin{blochsphere}[radius=1.5 cm,tilt=15,rotation=-20]
    \DrawLatitudeCircle[style={opacity=0.3}]{0}
    \DrawLongitudeCircle[style={opacity=0.3}]{90}
    \DrawLongitudeCircle[style={opacity=0.3}]{0}

    \DrawRadialPolar{psi}{0}{0}
    \node[above,yshift=0.2em] at (psi) {\tiny$\left|\psi\right>$};

    \DrawAxis[scale=1.5,style={dashed},axisarrow={->}]{45}{0}
    \LabelPolar[mark=0,scale=1.5]{B}{45}{0}
    \node[above right] at (B) {\tiny $\mathbf{B}$};

    \DrawTiltedLatitudeCircle[style={red,dashed}]{45}{0}{45}
    \pgfmathsetmacro{\rad}{0.2}
    \pgfmathsetmacro{\offset}{1.8}
    \DrawRightRotation[scale=\rad,style={red}]{45}{0}{\offset cm}{90}

  \end{blochsphere}
\end{document}
